Recent enrolment information for public and private elementary and secondary schools in British Columbia.  
Data Source: https://catalogue.data.gov.bc.ca/dataset/school-enrollment  


```{r map, warning=FALSE}
df <- read.csv("SCHL_ENRLM.csv")
#setnames(df, old=c("LATITUDE","LONGITUDE"), new=c("lat", "lng"))
df['TOTAL_ELM'] = df['ELMNTRY_ST']+df['SCNDRY_SCT']

library(leaflet)
leaflet(df) %>% 
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircleMarkers(clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions(), popup=paste(df$SCHOOL_NM,", Total Enrolment: ",df$TOTAL_ELM), weight=1, radius = sqrt(df$TOTAL_ELM) * 3, color = ifelse(df$ELMNTRY_ST>0, "green", "red") ) %>%
  addLegend(labels = c("Secondary Schools","Elementary Schools"), colors = c("red", "green"))
```
